label: Mock User
title: Injects mock user without any authentication.
desc: Use this if you want to test your application without using Bridge's SSO integrations. This will provide a mock user to test with.

label: Test User
title: Default Bridge test user.
desc: Use this if you want to use a test user provided by Bridge without the need of creating a Bridge account.

label: Bridge User
title: Bridge account user.
desc: Use this if you have a Bridge account and you want to log into that account to test against your Bridge ID. Your application can then verify user using SAML or OIDC if you are using Bridge as an Identity Provider.
